name: Remove ads
author: shazbot
label: Filter advertisements
desc:
Remove and block posts from the thread index deemed to be unsolicited advertisements. Targets spam, affiliate links, MLM schemes, click farming, and robotic posts.

This is a one-way process; toggling off does not unblock, it merely stops filtering. Does not currently work on microblogs.

fields.checkbox_label: Hide posts from very new accounts
Hide posts with abnormally low relative rank
